nodes.bodyText: Why not DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR: "/certs" as specified in the docs?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -13,6 +13,8 @@ services:
 variables:
   # Instruct Testcontainers to use the daemon of DinD.
   DOCKER_HOST: "tcp://docker:2375"
+  # Instruct Docker not to start over TLS.
+  DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR: ""

nodes.bodyText:
Original doc uses DOCKER_HOST: "tcp://docker:2375" which indicates TLS disabled mode.
I kept this sample related to TLS disabled mode.
See this docs section: https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/ci/docker/using_docker_build.html#tls-disabled where DOCKER_HOST and DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR is the same as I introduce in my PR here
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -13,6 +13,8 @@ services:
 variables:
   # Instruct Testcontainers to use the daemon of DinD.
   DOCKER_HOST: "tcp://docker:2375"
+  # Instruct Docker not to start over TLS.
+  DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR: ""

   DOCKER_HOST: "tcp://docker:2375"
